amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Global Nuclear Energy Partnership by $40 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funding level for the Global Nuclear Energy Partnership by $40 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 295 (Roll no. 197).
